basics.name: Josep González Preto
basics.label: Cloud Operations
basics.summary:
As a SysAdmin, I focused my professional career to work with Public Cloud (specially AWS).
Since I discovered the Cloud, I knew that this was what I wanted to learn and dedicate professionally.
Every day, arrive new technologies and improvements that enhance the Cloud, such as Terraform and Kubernetes, which I love to learn and use in my day to day.
I am originally from Menorca. And I have had many work experiences from other fields (specially tourism/restauration) that make me grow as a person that knows what he wants. However, since that I could study Systems Administration, I found in this job my true vocation and knew that this was what I wanted to dedicate professionally. I am really motivated to keep growing and learning.
One of my personal interests are videogames, they have been with me my whole life, and I really enjoy playing a good story to evade myself from the world; I also like to play boardgames, it's a hobby that I like to share with friends and with my girlfriend; I love pets, I have 3 cats and a dog; TV series (I completed Netflix); Cinema, specially Marvel Superheroes (not DC, well... I enjoyed the Batman trilogy of Christopher Nolan); and that is a bit of me.
I consider myself a responsible person, proactive and I enjoy teamwork, especially with good and professional people.

work.summary:
Cloud Managed Services: resolution of customer requests, incidents, changes, improvements and alerts.
Cloud infrastructure (Google Cloud Platform and Amazon Web Services) and legacy Datacenter.
Monitoring: Nagios, Grafana and Telegraf.
OpenSource Services and Techs: each client has different services based on their needs (Kubernetes, Dockers, Apache, Nginx, PHP, Mysql, Java, Redis, Memcached, Traefik, Haproxy, etc).
CI/CD: Jenkins, Gitlab
Scripting: Bash.
Some casual PHP programming and SQL queries.
ITIL methodology.
highlights: Started as a Cloud Operations level 1, and promoted to Cloud Operations level 2

Certifications:
- AWS Certified SysOps Administrator - Associate
- AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
- ITIL Foundation v4
